drupalNodeEvent.title: Art Study Center Seminar at Home, with Hong Chun Zhang

field_speakers.processed:
Hong Chun Zhang (Artist),
Jerrica Li (Harvard College Class of ’22; founder of The Wave magazine),
Sarah Laursen (Alan J. Dworsky Associate Curator of Chinese Art; Division of Asian and Mediterranean Art; Harvard Art Museums)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: In her work, Kansas-based Chinese artist Hong Chun Zhang reimagines the world around her as enveloped in hair. In conversation with The Wave, Harvard’s Asian literary and arts magazine, Zhang will explore how her identity, the environment, and the dual pandemics are woven into her recent work.
